title: Lights! Camera! Kiss! - Intimacy on screen
description: How actors are made to feel more comfortable in intimate scenes

vocabItems.definition: very successful movie or book that sells many copies and makes a lot of money
very close personal or sexual relationship between a couple
gently and repeatedly touch with your hand in a pleasurable way
do or make something that looks real but is not
legal document to either allow or prevent something being done in a different way from usual
